title: Orchards of Newburgh 2bed 1bath Apartments
posting_body: A pre-eminent, Michigan-based developer, investor and property manager for more than 40 years and two generations, York Properties has meticulously nurtured a reputation for impeccably-managed assets of exceptional opportunity and unparalleled value.

Through initiative, keen market insight and conservative, well-planned growth, York Properties has established a diverse portfolio of apartment residences and manufactured home communities in some of Michigan's most highly-desired locations.

As a family-owned and operated company, York Properties has carefully selected its assets for long-term investment-emphasizing the capital improvements, superior amenities and high levels of personal service that foster satisfied, long-term residents and provide excellent returns for its stakeholders.

A lean, efficient organization, York Properties is adept at recognizing and capitalizing on market opportunities, calling upon its legacy of experience and management consistency for growth through multiple real estate cycles
